roleset.name: extend over, as an arch

example.name: arching over
example.text: The most controversial of the Brady recommendations involved establishing a single overarching regulator to handle crucial cross - market questions , such as setting consistent margin requirements for the stock and futures markets .

roleset.note: OVERARCH-V NOTES: Frames file for 'overarch' based on sentences in wsj. no Verbnet entry. (from overarch.01-v predicate notes)
